EmailTemplate.subject: Your Exclusive Invitation To The Home Fashion Event Of The Year
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
EMBRACE THE ART NOUVEAU LIFESTYLE As the official champagne for MAISON&OBJET Asia, Perrier-Jouët invites you to attend its exclusive opening party at Marina Bay Sands on Tuesday March 10, 2015 from 5PM onwards.
MAISON&OBJET Asia follows its celebrated 20-year heritage in Paris by bringing together our shared philosophy of art nouveau to the home with the arts of living, new trends and new sources of inspiration from prestigious brands and artists in the interior design and decoration sectors.
Join other esteemed guests for a preview of the exhibition, as well as the Designer of the Year and Rising Asian Talents award presentations, followed by a cocktail reception with complimentary Perrier-Jouët Grand Brut champagne from us.
To learn more or to RSVP, please contact James Ting at +65 8699 9007 or james.ting@pernod-ricard.com.
